Villafuerte.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.flickr.com/photos/open_hardware_summit"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://www.flickr.com/photos/open_hardware_summit","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Videos of the event are available ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://vimeo.com/user14106369"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"here","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Since the 2013 Open Hardware Summit at MIT, Addie Wagenknecht has chaired the Summit and served on the board of the organization.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For 2015 we've got an incredible lineup of speakers starting with a keynote from AnnMarie Thomas, associate professor as ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"the Schulze School of Entrepreneurship, and the Opus College of Business at University of St. Thomas.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Following this we have panel conversations in Science and Education, Workflow, Projects and Processes and the Role of Open Hardware Going Forward featuring speakers who are at the cutting edge of ohsw. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hear from Nancy Ouyang, Joshua Pearce, Hugo Boyer, Eric Wilhelm, Andreas Olofsson, Michael Weinberg, J. Simmons, Kipp Bradford, Joshua Lifton, Benedetta Piantella, Tega Brain and Surya Mattu and so so many more.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
